title: This is broken
description: Why are so many things broken? In a hilarious talk from the 2006 Gel conference, Seth Godin gives a tour of things poorly designed, the 7 reasons why they are that way, and how to fix them.
author: Seth Godin
keywords: TED, talks, advertising, business, design, marketing
